channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What you need to know about stablecoins and stock tokens as Robinhood and Circle shares jump
item.description: Also: A look ahead as the S&P 500 returns to setting record highs; how to decide on a Roth IRA conversion; and more pointed advice from the Moneyist.

item.title: The one thing that’s driving home sellers bananas right now — and making buyers happy
item.description: Increasing levels of housing inventory have pitted buyers against sellers.

item.title: Will Trump’s megabill cut your taxes? Check this number on your tax return for the answer.
item.description: Tax breaks in the megabill, like no taxes on tips and overtime, only apply to people at certain income levels.

item.title: Here’s what’s worth streaming in July 2025 on Netflix, Hulu, Max, Disney+ and more

item.title: ‘Today is my 61st birthday’: I have my ex-spouse’s Social Security benefits. Should I retire at 65 and travel?
item.description: “When my former husband passes, I will qualify for widow’s benefits.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
